Articles.Content:
> How come it's taped to the ceiling?

So it doesn't fall down.

Is 1.0 near, I think I heard something about that???

HYPE!
Update on my quest for the planets before 1.0: I've completed the entire Kerbin System and landed on Duna, what next?

> 
> Update on my quest for the planets before 1.0: I've completed the entire Kerbin System and landed on Duna, what next?

 Do a return from Eve before the aero changes ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
I am extremely late to the train, can I still get a ticket? I have ten funds right here.
lol, i was thinking i'd save that for last. Also im returning from all the places that i go,

I just want to say...

MOAR HYPE!
We gon break 0.90 recahd! Hype...
Well, now that I've set up my Duna base (well okay, I've landed it, but I still need to build some bits), not sure what to do next now that 1.0 is coming out VERY soon.

> How come it's taped to the ceiling?

It too big to put anywhere else!

It's actually hanging from the box where the ceiling fan should be.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-24T20:21:21Z" title="04/24/2015 08:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 24, 2015</time> by Tracer13**

> 
> I am extremely late to the train, can I still get a ticket? I have ten funds right here.

Ten funds? Wow, thats like... $3,781.30! 

btw I calculated the worth of a fund via the price of fuel and got ~ $378.13, although now that I think about it funds are probably worth more given that by that logic most 90% of rockets cost under 1 billion dollars

> 
> It's odd that I see all these people dealing with lack of RAM. I can run a quantity of mods that rivals Eve in size, and suffer nothing more than a massive FPS hit.
> And I have 3.5 gigs of RAM.

I have 8 :3 still get 2 fps when the ship is 1500-2500 parts... unsure after that. My maximum fps is set to 10.
Missed that there was a load of info and pictures shown on the tuesday update. Super super hyped now.
hyppo

> 
> I have 8 :3 still get 2 fps when the ship is 1500-2500 parts... unsure after that. My maximum fps is set to 10.

I am jealous of you people who can get something that big without crashing all the time. I was crashing a lot when building my 614 part Duna colony ship

> 
> hyppo

Is that a hype hippo or a hype typo?

> 
> Is that a hype hippo or a hype typo?

Hype hippo?

> 
> Hype hippo?

You don't want to ride the Hype Hippo?

> 
> You don't want to ride the Hype Hippo?

Let's make a hype zoo carriage on the hype train then put the hype hippo in it!

> 
> Well, now that I've set up my Duna base (well okay, I've landed it, but I still need to build some bits), not sure what to do next now that 1.0 is coming out VERY soon.

So.... any ideas from you guys?

> 
> So.... any ideas from you guys?

Blow it up awesomely!
No, I don't want to blow up the base..... Maybe on the day 1.0 comes out though.

> 
> Let's make a hype zoo carriage on the hype train then put the hype hippo in it!

Yes! We should!!

- - - Updated - - -

On to page 1,000!!!!

Hype hippo located and in flight:

![566496_302d_625x1000.jpg](http://worth1000.s3.amazonaws.com/submissions/566000/566496_302d_625x1000.jpg)

> 
> Hype hippo located and in flight:
> [http://worth1000.s3.amazonaws.com/submissions/566000/566496_302d_625x1000.jpg](http://worth1000.s3.amazonaws.com/submissions/566000/566496_302d_625x1000.jpg)

This.....is the best thing......ever ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
